Bug_report.Title: It is not redicrected to the main page after clicking on home page icon in the header of the site
Bug_report.Precondition: <1> Open site www.saucedemo.com </1> <2> Login as standard_user </2>
Bug_report.STR: <1> Click on any product card </1> <2> Click on home page icon in header </2>
Bug_report.Expected: Redirected to the main page after clicking on the home page icon
Bug_report.Actual_result: It is not redicrected to the main page after clicking on hope page icon in the header of the site
